summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganGive BackMilani Conceal + Perfect Concealer is a super pigmented, full coverage formula. Blends seamlessly to mask imperfections, hyper-pigmentation, discoloration.
details: DetailsFeaturesFull coverage concealerBlends seamlesslyDesigned for 12 hours of crease-free, water-resistant wearAntioxidant-rich formula helps protect skin from environmental damageKey IngredientsFeatures Hyaluronic Acid, a moisture magnet that holds 1,000 times its weight in waterShea Butter and Olive Fruit Oil moisturize and condition skin while protecting its moisture barrierPolyphenols and Cocoa Peptides help protect skinFormulated WithoutParabensItem 2546823How To UseApply a small amount using the precision doe foot applicator and blend to a crease-free finish.IngredientsCyclopentasiloxane, Water (Aqua), Dimethicone, Cetyl PEG/PPG-10/1 Dimethicone, Methyl Methacrylate Crosspolymer, PEG-10 Dimethicone, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Butylene Glycol, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Mica, Phenoxyethanol, Silica Silylate, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Cyclohexasiloxane, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Ethylhexylglycerin, Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Hyaluronate, Glycerin, Lycopodium Clavatum Extract, Imperata Cylindrica Root Extract. May Contain: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Oxides (CI 77492, CI 77491, CI 77499).
how_to_use: Apply a small amount using the precision doe foot applicator and blend to a crease-free finish.
ingredients: Imperata Cylindrica Root Extract. May Contain: Titanium Dioxide (

reviews.headline: Does the job well but I prefer to use sparingly
reviews.comments: This concealer worked really well for me! It conceals well and does not budge! I found that I prefer it when I use it sparingly because it is so powerful, and I needed to blend it immediately because it dries fast. In the end those are workable cons and this product will be part of my regular routine going forward!

reviews.headline: Works perfect
reviews.comments: For the price point this is amazing. It sets beautifully even without primer. It doesn't break up or crease for me.

reviews.headline: no..
reviews.comments: i have really dry and sensitive skin and it just puts little dots under my eyes and crease badly. not for the dry skin.

reviews.headline: I had high hopes
reviews.comments: I'm 46. It's just not good for aging under eyes. It sunk into every wrinkle and line under my eye and highlighted it. Too bad because the coverage is good. Glad I got it on sale. Probably go into my spot concealer collection but I have a ton due to trying so many.

reviews.headline: not for the acne prone!!
reviews.comments: I got this concealer and I originally was very excited because i heard good things about it online! As soon as i put it on my face, it oxidized and got really orange. I decided to let it sit there to get more coverage and i would not blend at all! It dries down VERY quickly. After a couples days, i then noticed huge cystic acne forming right where i put it. I took a break from the concealer and it slowly went away. SO! IF YOU HAVE ACNE PRONE SKIN, NEED FULL COVERAGE, OR A EXACT SHADE MATCH, THIS CONCEALER IS NOT FOR YOU!!

reviews.headline: Shade range and oxidation
reviews.comments: I love the formula and it is long lasting but i have found that it oxidizes and turns out to look to dark after it dries down. I've had to change to a lighter shade that seems almost too light but looks better after drying down. Shade range should expand

reviews.headline: Why change??
reviews.comments: This used to be my favorite and the shade was a good light yellow/peach. Now the same shade is more of a dark pink!

reviews.headline: Need a lighter shade
reviews.comments: Need a lighter shade but loving the formula! Covers blemishes nicely but sadly too dark for my under eye area (i wear the lightest or 2nd lightest shade in most foundations)

reviews.headline: I would not buy this again.
reviews.comments: I had high hopes for this product due to its affordability, but was disappointed due to its dryness. Definitely would not recommend on mature, 50 ish skin.

reviews.headline: wouldn't recommend
reviews.comments: love the applicator for this but bad coverage and it's hard to blend.

reviews.headline: milani concealer
reviews.comments: it is really nice but if you put too much product it looks cakey!

reviews.headline: Optimal
reviews.comments: this is a pretty great option. it's definitely high-coverage, almost paint like. i didn't experience any creasing with this either. only gripe i have is more of a preference thing since my skin is on the drier side. i have been layering this on top of more dewy concealers, and using it as a brightner. works pretty well!

reviews.headline: Lovely ￼
reviews.comments: I love the way it glides on it doesn't make you look caked up and it's not heavy

reviews.headline: Okay not to bad
reviews.comments: Okay so i had bought a shade lighter then my foundation so that it can look brighter i would recommend it but when i blended it, it looked like it disappeared but it can also be because of the foundation i used or maybe i didnt mosturize my face enough but if you want a affordable councelar this could be one.

reviews.headline: Okay not to bad
reviews.comments: Okay so i had bought a shade lighter then my foundation so that it can look brighter i would recommend it but when i blended it, it looked like it disappeared but it can also be because of the foundation i used or maybe i didnt mosturize my face enough but if you want a affordable councelar this could be one.

reviews.headline: Literally the best concealer I have ever tried
reviews.comments: My new holy grail.  I pray they don't reformulate because there is absolutely NO creasing.  The price point is perfection, and I actually look forward to using it every day.  I've never felt this way about a concealer before!  The only thing is that I wish they would have a few more deeper shades available here in ULTA!

reviews.headline: Does it job and works
reviews.comments: I'm in my late 40's with fair skin and have dark under eyes along with an embarrassing dark pigmented upper lip. This concealer covers up and evens me out. It's not heavy and not sticky just goes in smooth.

reviews.headline: Drying and highlights lines
reviews.comments: I got this concealer because a YouTuber said this was moisturizing. Unfortunately, I have found it to be very drying and it accentuates the lighes under my eyes because it is drying.

reviews.headline: Dries fast, looks dry after use
reviews.comments: It's not the worst concealer, but leaving the concealer on as a dot to set in and then blend is impossible, as it dries super fast. I also find that it creases and dries and doesn't have a skin-like finish.

reviews.headline: My favorite concealer by far!!!
reviews.comments: I have tried MANY drugstore concealers and this is by far my favorite!! Super creamy snd has good coverage! Oily skin approved for sure

faceoff_positive.comments: I am happy to find a multitasking concealer that doubles as liquid foundation as well as longevity. I applied with the applicator wand that comes with the tube and a beauty blender type sponge a foundation flat brush and setting spray. The formula is on the thick side and needs a little work to blend over your face. I sugest working quickly to blend and if it gets a little tough to apply spray your beauty blender with setting spray to thin out. It took me about 10 mins to apply and I was very satisfied with the results below in my photos are my areas of concern and how well it greatly minimized the appearance of the blemishes its a 9/10 for me
faceoff_positive.headline: Great all in one full face tool

faceoff_negative.comments: This was the first time I've used a Milani product. I was sent a free sample and I can say at this point I am on the fence about it. The color match was great. I was sent shade 135 medium beige. The concealer consistency was good as well. It wasn't too thick or too runny. But the coverage didn't seem to meet my needs. I will admit that I applied it to a bare non-primed face for this wear test. I found that it applied evenly and did blend out well. But within an hour i noticed it began to settle into the creases under my eyes. As time went on I noticed it started to cake a bit. This being my first impressions of the product I wasn't fully impressed. However, I will use it again to see if i have the same outcome. For the price point, it's about average but I was hoping for better coverage and wear time. I also noticed that depending on the lighting i was in I could see my dark circles more. I also noticed that as i patted under my eye just now most of the concealer came off on my fingertip. But once again I will give this product another try.
faceoff_negative.headline: good color match but......
